mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO(USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_PW, USER_EMAIL, ZIP_NUM, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, TEL_PHONE, CELL_PHONE, EMAIL_REV_YN) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_nm}, #{user_pw}, #{user_email}, #{zip_num}, #{addr}, #{addr_dtl}, #{tel_phone}, #{cell_phone}, #{email_rev_yn})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_PW, USER_EMAIL, ZIP_NUM, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, TEL_PHONE, CELL_PHONE, EMAIL_REV_YN, USER_POINT, STA_DATE, LAST_DATE, AUTHCODE, SESSION_KEY, SESSION_LIMIT FROM USER_INFO WHERE SESSION_KEY = #{value} AND SESSION_LIMIT > now()

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NM, USER_PW, USER_EMAIL, ZIP_NUM, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, TEL_PHONE, CELL_PHONE, EMAIL_REV_YN, USER_POINT, STA_DATE, LAST_DATE, AUTHCODE, SESSION_KEY, SESSION_LIMIT FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}
